mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board SET title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, writer_id=#{writerId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.board_id AS boardId, A.title, A.contents, B.uid AS writer, A.hits, A.created_at AS createdAt, A.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM board A INNER JOIN user B ON B.user_id=A.writer_id ORDER BY A.board_id DESC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{size}
